tickets.title: Fix order reconciliation logic in reconciler.ts
tickets.description: Resolve the unimplemented TODO in src/polymarket/reconciler.ts that is causing incorrect filled quantities. This is a critical data integrity issue blocking other deployments.
acceptanceCriteria: Investigate and define the specific logic required for the unimplemented TODO
Verify that filled quantities are calculated correctly
Add unit tests to prevent regression

tickets.title: Deploy and monitor async price cache (PR #156)
tickets.description: Deploy the Redis-backed async price cache feature. Ensure the kill switch (PRICES_ENABLED) is functional and monitor the /v1/prices/health endpoint. Must define fallback behavior if Redis becomes unavailable.
acceptanceCriteria: Verify PR #155 is merged and deployed
Document and test Redis failure fallback behavior
Monitor logs for concurrency-limited CLOB API calls

tickets.title: Update agent.md with market progress
tickets.description: Update the agent.md documentation to reflect the current status of the creator flow, liquidity seeding, and general price action market progress.
acceptanceCriteria: Document general progress on price action markets

tickets.title: Complete Helius and Oracle integration
tickets.description: Finish the integration of Helius and Oracle modules into the market creation flow as noted in the handoff documentation.
acceptanceCriteria: Integrate Helius module into market creation flow
Integrate Oracle module into market creation flow
Verify end-to-end functionality of the integrated flow

tickets.title: Implement proxy wallet authentication
tickets.description: Address the existing TODO in src/polymarket/client.ts regarding proxy wallet support.

tickets.title: Add synthesis test note
tickets.description: Add the requested test note for synthesis.
acceptanceCriteria: Test note is added to the designated location
